title: [Medicine] After traumatic brain injury, a protein called "NfL" spills out of neurons, and into the blood. Neurologists can now detect it, and predict how their patients will recover.

[Cancer] In recent years, there has been some evidence that dietary interventions can help to slow the growth of tumors. A new study that analysed two different diets in mice revealed how those diets affect cancer cells, and offers an explanation for why restricting calories may slow tumor growth.
